sentence: The image shows a mobile screenshot of a YouTube video page.
sentence_cn: 该图为 YouTube 视频页面的移动屏幕截图。

sentence: The top section displays an advertisement for Microsoft with a video featuring a person speaking.
sentence_cn: 顶部显示了微软的广告，其中有一个人讲话的视频。

sentence: The ad duration is 53 seconds, and there's an option to "Skip Ad" on the right.
sentence_cn: 广告时长为53秒，右侧有“跳过广告”选项。

sentence: Below the ad, there is an ongoing live stream titled "EU LCS Spring 2017 - Week 7 Day 2: G2 vs. SPY | FNC vs. UOL," hosted by "LoL Esports," with 31,083 viewers.
sentence_cn: 广告下方是正在进行的直播，题为“2017 年 EU LCS 春季赛 - 第 7 周第 2 天：G2 vs. SPY | FNC vs. UOL”，由“LoL Esports”主办，共有 31,083 名观众观看。
words: EU LCS Spring 2017 - Week 7 Day 2: G2 vs. SPY | FNC vs. UOL,

sentence_cn: 有 589 人喜欢，32 人不喜欢。

sentence: Under the video, suggested videos are listed.
sentence_cn: 在视频下方，列出了推荐的视频。

sentence: One of them is titled "Tobias Fate - Three in a Row!" with 138,767 views.
sentence_cn: 其中一篇名为“Tobias Fate - Three in a Row!”，观看次数达到 138,767 次。
words: Tobias Fate - Three in a Row!

sentence: The thumbnail shows a character in a fiery scene.
sentence_cn: 缩略图显示了火热场景中的一名角色。

sentence: Another suggested video is titled "HIGH ELO RAGERS 3 (GONE SEXUAL - 1V9?)."
sentence_cn: 另一个推荐视频的标题为“HIGH ELO RAGERS 3 (GONE SEXUAL - 1V9?)”。
